G

gbuild - package gbuild
This package contains the implementation of simple gBuild components used to build complex UI elements.
gbuild.button - package gbuild.button
This package includes all the types of buttons that can be used to construct complex components.
gbuild.dialog - package gbuild.dialog
This package provides the implementation of movable dialogs.
gbuild.menu - package gbuild.menu
This package offers the implementation of different types of menus.
GButton - Class in gbuild.button
Component defined as a clickable button This class is the definition of a button that can be selected and incorporates an effect on which the color of a component of the button would change wether user is hovering it.
GButton - Class in gbuild.button
Component defined as a clickable button This class is the definition of a button that can be selected and incorporates an effect on which the color of a component of the button would change wether user is hovering it.

GButtonClose - Class in gbuild.button
Button with the shape of a close button This button is a set of components that formed an square rectangle with an x inside it that should be associated to an event for closing the component.

GColor - Class in gbuild
Data type which stores a RGB color Processing language environment has utilities which can be used to define colors using RGB or HSV format.
GColor - Class in gbuild
Data type which stores a RGB color Processing language environment has utilities which can be used to define colors using RGB or HSV format.
GColor(GColor) - Constructor for class gbuild.GColor
Create a new instance of a RGB color Since RGB colors have three component (red, green, blue), this class can define a color passing one, two, or three of these components, so, when a value is not defined, will be equal to zero or null.
GColor(Float...) - Constructor for class gbuild.GColor
Create a new instance of a RGB color Since RGB colors have three component (red, green, blue), this class can define a color passing one, two, or three of these components, so, when a value is not defined, will be equal to zero or null.
GColor(Integer...) - Constructor for class gbuild.GColor
Create a new instance of a RGB color Since RGB colors have three component (red, green, blue), this class can define a color passing one, two, or three of these components, so, when a value is not defined, will be equal to zero or null.

GComponent - Class in gbuild
General definition of a gBuild UI component Since Processing figures are drawn at a specific location and dimension, this class considers a component as the set of 2D/3D primitives or figures located at a position, with an anchor and length, that can be visible or hided for user.
GComponent - Class in gbuild
General definition of a gBuild UI component Since Processing figures are drawn at a specific location and dimension, this class considers a component as the set of 2D/3D primitives or figures located at a position, with an anchor and length, that can be visible or hided for user.
GComponent(PApplet) - Constructor for class gbuild.GComponent
Create a new gBuild component Normally, components use basic Processing functions to draw or customize its properties.
GComponent(PApplet, GComponent) - Constructor for class gbuild.GComponent
Create a new gBuild component Components on gBuild can be related to another one which will be named as its parent.
GComponent(PApplet) - Constructor for class gbuild.GComponent
Create a new gBuild component Normally, components use basic Processing functions to draw or customize its properties.
GComponent(PApplet, GComponent) - Constructor for class gbuild.GComponent
Create a new gBuild component Components on gBuild can be related to another one which will be named as its parent.
GDialog - Class in gbuild.dialog
Dialog component which is movable This class was designed to offer to developers an easy way to build dialogs that can incorporate to its content lots of different components.
GDialog - Class in gbuild.dialog

Globals - Class in gbuild
Public constants and variables for gBuild components gBuild includes lots of default values for the attributes of UI components, as well as variables that are necessary to implements events on Processing.
Globals - Class in gbuild
Public constants and variables for gBuild components gBuild includes lots of default values for the attributes of UI components, as well as variables that are necessary to implements events on Processing.

GPanel - Class in gbuild
Component that is a set of components Processing language environment does not include an implementation of a container that store primitives or figures, so it can be difficult to define a set of components that are associated between them.
GPanel - Class in gbuild

GText - Class in gbuild
Component defined with a text Processing language evironment does not include an explicit data type for texts, but it offers lots of functions that allows to define properties for texts that will be drawn.
